dashboard.label: VENDORS & PRODUCT AFFECTED
dashboard.definition:
{"visualizations":{"viz_FdS1uONw":{"type":"splunk.table","dataSources":{"primary":"ds_advisories_chart"},"showProgressBar":false,"showLastUpdated":false,"options":{"count":4}},"viz_kvxnnGig":{"type":"splunk.pie","options":{"showDonutHole":true},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_donut_vendor_product_distribution_by_country"},"title":"Vendor Product Distribution by Country"},"viz_3JiEKaEF":{"type":"splunk.column","dataSources":{"primary":"ds_advisories_distribution_over_time"},"showProgressBar":false,"showLastUpdated":false,"title":"Advisories distribution over time"}},"dataSources":{"ds_advisories_chart":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| inputlookup ics_cert_project_lookup 
| strcat "https://www.cisa.gov/uscert/ics/advisories/" ICS-CERT_Number ics_cert_link
| rex mode=sed field=Products_Affected "s/\\n/ | /g"
| rename ICS-CERT_Number as "ICS-CERT Number", ICS-CERT_Advisory_Title as "ICS-CERT Advisory Title", ics_cert_link as "Link to CISA ICS-CERT Advisory" , Product_Distribution as "Product Distribution", Products_Affected as "Products Affected", Cumulative_CVSS as CVSS, "CVSS_Severity" as Severity
| streamstats count as "#" 
| table "#" "ICS-CERT Number" Vendor Product "Product Distribution" "Products Affected" CVSS Severity "Link to CISA ICS-CERT Advisory""},"name":"advisories_chart"},"ds_donut_vendor_product_distribution_by_country":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| inputlookup ics_cert_project_lookup 
| rename Product_Distribution as "Product Distribution"
| stats count by "Product Distribution""},"name":"donut_vendor_product_distribution_by_country"},"ds_advisories_distribution_over_time":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| inputlookup ics_cert_project_lookup 
| addinfo 
| eval _time=strptime(Original_Release_Date,"%m/%d/%Y") 
| where _time>=info_min_time and _time<info_max_time 
| timechart count
| table _time count","queryParameters":{"earliest":"-5y","latest":"now"}},"name":"advisories_distribution_over_time"}},"defaults":{"dataSources":{"ds.search":{"options":{"queryParameters":{"latest":"$global_time.latest$","earliest":"$global_time.earliest$"}}}}},"inputs":{"input_global_trp":{"type":"input.timerange","options":{"token":"global_time","defaultValue":"-24h@h,now"},"title":"Global Time Range"},"input_U6nsGbtO":{"options":{"items":[{"label":"All","value":"*"},{"label":"Item 1","value":"item001"},{"label":"Item 2","value":"item002"},{"label":"Item 3","value":"item003"}],"defaultValue":["item001","item002"],"token":"ms_UC0GwgNb"},"title":"Vendor","type":"input.multiselect"},"input_FuvisT3x":{"options":{"items":[{"label":"All","value":"*"},{"label":"Item 1","value":"item001"},{"label":"Item 2","value":"item002"},{"label":"Item 3","value":"item003"}],"defaultValue":["item001","item002"],"token":"ms_a7PtnTID"},"title":"Products Affected","type":"input.multiselect"}},"layout":{"type":"absolute","options":{"display":"auto-scale","width":1950,"height":950,"backgroundColor":"#202124"},"structure":[{"item":"viz_FdS1uONw","type":"block","position":{"x":20,"y":10,"w":1900,"h":580}},{"item":"viz_kvxnnGig","type":"block","position":{"x":30,"y":610,"w":860,"h":320}},{"item":"viz_3JiEKaEF","type":"block","position":{"x":910,"y":610,"w":1010,"h":320}}],"globalInputs":["input_global_trp","input_U6nsGbtO","input_FuvisT3x"]},"description":"","title":"VENDORS & PRODUCT AFFECTED"}
